TopicTitle: How to cook an Ice cream sundae, KERBAL STYLE

Articles.Content:
I saw this video on youtube, and it made me laugh for about a minute straight, so I thought I\'d share it.

It\'s also how I predict a show called 'Cooking With The Kermin\'s' might turn out.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5axZBLvkwvY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

BRILLIANT

I liked the sprinkles at the end.
